mean_cn: v. 相像; 相似; 类似;

sentence: She and her pet dog have a strong connection with each other.

words: be/feel in the mood (for sth. / to do sth.)

sentence_tra: 我用我的账户支付了账单。

mean_cn: adj.浪漫的，传奇式的，不切实际的，好幻想的

sentence: The pirates set off from the island.
sentence_tra: 这些海盗从小岛出发了。

mean_cn: adj. 鲜明的;  活泼的;  生动的;  清晰的;

sentence: The murderer always wore a suit for his murders.
sentence_tra: 这个凶手总是穿着正装行凶。

sentence: How thick a rope do we need?

sentence: Mostly. white hens lay white eggs (with the occasional exception.)

sentence: The thief was clever enough to steal the money and run away before the police arrived.

sentence_tra: 他们都决心赢得比赛。

sentence: First bend to the right, then bend to the left.

mean_cn: n. 海; 深海;adj. 深度的; 深切的; 深远的; 知识渊博的; 见解深刻的; 深奥的;

Our family likes to go to the beach for leisure time during the summer.

sentence: A helping hand makes a big difference.
sentence_tra: 一只援手能起到重要作用。

sentence: This space satellite transmits TV signals to earth.
sentence_tra: 这颗人造卫星把电视信号传输到地球。

sentence: Awww, that kitten is so cute!
sentence_tra: 啊，这小猫真可爱！

sentence: I like to take the subway to work.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢坐地铁去上班。

sentence: This is the newest edition of the book.
sentence_tra: 这是这本书最新的版本了。

sentence: The metric system is the standard system of measurement in most countries.
sentence_tra: 公制度量系统是大多数国家使用的标准测量系统。

sentence: Well, I omitted many important things from the letter.
sentence_tra: 好吧，我从这封信里删掉了很多重要的东西。

sentence: The distinctive color of the red rose made it stand out in the photo.
sentence_tra: 与众不同的颜色让这朵红玫瑰在照片中变得突出。

sentence: Add some milk to the bowl.
sentence_tra: 加点牛奶在碗里。

sentence: The character of the left is complicated. Can we simplify it, like on the right?
sentence_tra: 左边的字很复杂，我们能不能简化它，像右边一样？
